short_description: fiorentino is a florist based in thessaloniki municipal unit, greece.
long_description: a blend of nostalgia and innovation, infusing our flowers with character. in 1973, in the corner of dimitriou gounari street and prigkipos nikolaou (today's a. a magical evening approaches its end, but an entire story begins. in 1980, the company expands and in the wholesale trade imports plants from the netherlands with two greenhouses, in foinikas pylaia and n.sillata, which become protagonists in the wholesale trade of plants in thessaloniki. twenty years passed with fiorentino being the number one choice for all occasions. in 2011, fiorentino creations moves to mitropoleos 82, becoming the mecca of the city's flowers, making decisions based on continuous evolution, uncompromising quality, and the passion that makes fiorentino creations' flowers shine differently from the rest. in 2015, thessaloniki meets its first luxury flower shop, fiorentino luxury floral services. since then, its display has become a center of attraction, with unprecedented ideas for the public. premium boxes and eternity roses become a trend in flower shops across greece, with fiorentino lfs holding the privilege of specialization and superiority as a pioneer.
business_tags: flower shops | major renovations | floral services | luxury flowers | flower making | wholesale | greenhouses | wedding floral | floral artistry | floral designer | public relations | seo internet marketing
generated_description: fiorentino is a flower shop based in thessaloniki, central macedonia, greece. founded in 1973 by anastasis avanoglou and ioannis hortis, the company initially operated from mitropoleos 103. fiorentino specializes in high-quality floral arrangements and has expanded its services to include wholesale trade and luxury floral services. over the years, the company has undergone several renovations and expansions, including a major renovation in 1988 and the establishment of a luxury flower shop in 2009. in 2019, the company moved to a new location in athens, and in 2022, a workshop and showroom in athens was inaugurated. fiorentino continues to be a prominent name in the floral industry, known for its innovative designs and commitment to quality.
